# label

**Instance Property**

An optional name for the input/output command buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var label: String? { get set }
```

## Debugging a command buffer

- **pushDebugGroup(_:)**: Sets the current name for this input/output command encoder by adding it to the top of the debug name stack.
- **popDebugGroup()**: Restores the previous name for this input/output command encoder by removing the top item of the debug name stack.
